cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Bed in a 8-Bed Community Room -  Ideal for solo travelers, features include a shared bathroom, equipped with a light, a shelf, and a locker so you can keep your belongings safe and secure. Towel Service available for an additional cost of 6 AUD per towel.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Double Room with shared bathroom - Similar to a ship or train cabin, this is our most basic sleeping solution. Compact and modest, It's perfect if youâ€™re looking for a place to sleep and a small area to store your belongings. The bathroom is shared.

privates.labelDescription: Perfect for guests looking for a little something extra, our Premium Room offers an authentic local experience designed with your comfort and privacy in mind.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
